Here is an In-Depth tutorial on how to install.

1. Get Virtual CloneDrive and Install

2. Right click FLT-VCA, OPEN WITH and it should say Mount Files With Virtual CloneDrive

3. After that is done, it will open up the install, and it will start installing.

4. About halfway through it will ask to put in the disc with the audio file. Right click FLT-VCB, and mount those files. Now locate F:/ and select it as the file for the disc. It will begin to install the rest.

5. Once it is done open the file you just mounted for the audio file. (F) Then there should be a folder called crack, go into it and copy the icon that says gta-vc. Paste that icon into C://Program Files/Rockstar Games/Grand Theft Auto Vice City. And replace the existing gta-vc.

THAT'S IT YOU'RE DONE! HAVE FUN!

I'm going to write a little tutorial, like it worked at mine:

1. Burn only the second part. Burn the CUE file! It's called FLT-VCB.cue
2. Download Winmount (google for it) and install and run it..
3. Click in winmount on 'mount file' and select the file: FLT-VCA.bin (this time the bin).
4. It should open a fake CD-drive. From there you can setup it. When it asks for the second CD, just put the CD you burned in the drive, then you browse for that drive (D:\ in my case)
5. Open from your burned CD the crack folder, browse to program files-Rockstar Games-Grand Theft Auto Vice City and put it there. The PC will ask you if you want to replace it, say yes.
6. Some people make here also a mistake: choose the crack filee in the program files, click RMB and choose: copy to desktop.

For guyz who r not abl 2 install dis game

1) download daemon tools
2) there will be 2 cue and 2 bin files in the torrent
3) open daemon tools and add image
4) the 'image' is in watever location u downloaded the torrent to
5) mount the image(u need to browse  etc etc and add the image file
6) there will be 2 image files..for cd 1 and cd 2
7) mount the 2 images on 2 different "virtual drives"
8) wat daemon tools does is..it tricks the computer into thinking dat the cd is in the drive...actually it isnt
9) after mounting both cds..click on the first cd icon in daemon tools
10) setup will run automatically
11) halfway.. it will ask for cd 2.
12) As you have mounted cd2..just click ok.
13) installation finishes
14) now open cd 2(from my computer) 
15) there will be a crack folder...it will contain gta vc
16) copy this onto your installed directory (remember installation from cd 1??...the location you have chosen)
17) replace the gta vc file in your installed location with the crack file from cd2
18)  wala!!!!!   

njoy..

Okay, for those of you who have problems with the mouse not working in Win7.. here is the fix:

Right Click the .EXE file > Properties > Compatibility > Disable Visual Themes!

That's it! 
Don't tinker with Compatibility modes or anything else!

Fixed the issue

I HAVE GOT VICE CITY WORKING ON WINDOWS 7 WITH NO COMPATIBILITY MODES

If you are getting an "Unhandled Exception - C0000005 at 006F6330" error every time you try to run GTA, keep reading.

As you can see below I had a problem with Vice City, but I've *just* discovered how to make it work. The problem lies with Windows 7's DEP (Data Execution Prevention)

To fix it, do the following:
Delete .set file from your DocumentsVice City User Files folder
Open the Start menu, in the search box type "advanced system settings".
One result will appear, click it.
In the window that opens, click the Advanced tab, then the first Settings button
Go to the "Data Execution Prevention" tab, and click "Add..." to add an exception.
Browse to your gta-vc.exe and select it.
Now "OK" all the dialogs until they're closed.
